metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9925 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In SWFTools 2013-04-09-1007 on Windows, png2swf allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service via a crafted file,related to a "User Mode Write AV near NULL starting atwow64!Wow64NotifyDebugger+0x000000000000001d."

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
